name.ja: <ruby>憤<rt>ふん</rt></ruby><ruby>砕<rt>さい</rt></ruby><ruby>竜<rt>りゅう</rt></ruby>アンガーローグ

requirement.en: If you have another face-up Dinosaur Type monster on your field, send the top card of your Deck to the Graveyard.

effect.en: All face-up monsters with the highest ATK on your opponent's field lose ATK equal to [the DEF of the face-up monster with the highest DEF on your field] until the end of this turn.
